nodes.bodyText:
It's strange to end the names in _ENV_VAR, it's redundant. I wouldn't do it.
As this is not generic AWS config but just for Nuxeo tests, it's worth adding that in their name: AWS_BUCKET_NAME_NUXEO_TEST
Also you should put these in a constant in a single file and reuse it from elsewhere, to avoid duplication and typos.
Finally, you should do similar changes in the new TestS3BlobStoreAbstract.

Hello @efge ,
thanks you , i will apply changes.
